items.text: uses his feet again, and this full ball is drilled down to long on for a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to KOA Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, but spinning inwards sharply! Surprises Hope, but he manages to carve a punch to the off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: dropped at long on! Sabbir the guilty man this time. It's a full ball which Powell chips over the non-striker. Sabbir does the hard work, and dives forward too, but just can't hold on to the catch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on middle, and Hope flicks this past the diving midwicket fielder. Fifty for Hope!
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Shri: "129 off 84.. if only the next batsmen to come were Bravo and Pollard..." -- you could see them at the next World Cup though
items.text: aimed on leg stump, and shoveled to Mashrafe at midwicket. Indecision from the batsman, as they say yes-no-yes-no, and Mortaza has a shy at the non-striker's stumps. But he misses
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, 1 run

items.text: appeal for lbw turned down! Length ball on middle, and spinning into his pads
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and Hope drives to cover. But this time Powell is already halfway down the wicket with Hope still at the keeper's end. No chance of a single, as Mashrafe collects, lobs the ball to Mehidy, and he wastes no time in whipping the bails off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, OUT

dismissal.text: KOA Powell run out (Mashrafe Mortaza/Mehidy Hasan Miraz) 4 (7b 0x4 0x6) SR: 57.14

items.text: lands on off stump, and Hope goes onto the back foot to clip it square
items.postText: Davo from Guyan: "And a 3rd wicket for Hope! Can he get a 5 for???" -- Haha, harsh though
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full and wide outside off. Hope misses the square drive, but the ball finishes inside the tramlines. Dot ball
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: full outside off again, and cut away to point. Finds the fielder once again
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: full on middle, and defended to the leg side with soft hands. They walk across for one. Required-run rate over 10.50 now
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, and he muscles a punch off the back foot to the leg side
items.postText: Owais Yusuf: "If not this dismissal, I don't know what will motivate Hope to stay till the end and finish it. It was clearly his fault. Should have never took off, even the couple of steps."
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off, and angling into Hope. He crunches a punch to the fielder at deep extra cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: thumped to the cow-corner boundary! Full on off, and he slogs across the line to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, FOUR runs

items.preText: Sajib: "It's a shame Shakib is still wicketless today. His pressure from one side meant wickets for the others."
items.text: full just outside off, and driven away to deep extra cover. Work for Sabbir in the deep, but his diving effort ensures it's not a boundary. Every run saved counts...
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and he pushes to cover with soft hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on middle, and angling into his body. Tries to punch to the on side, but the ball goes through to hit his thigh pad. Mortaza appeals for lbw, but not given
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, no run

items.text: rolls his fingers over this delivery. Much slower, and lands outside off. Tentatively fended away to the off side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and pulled over midwicket! The infielder may have gotten fingertips to it, and that saves the boundary, because the ball's pace slows down considerably. Mehidy the fielder
items.postText: Sneh : "It's Bangladesh's match to lose now..Moment of rejoice awaiting for the people watching this match at mid night in Bangladesh." -- more like 2:34 am, Sneh
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 2 runs

items.text: slower ball, full outside off. Tapped to cover off the front foot, and he'll retain the strike
items.postText: Muhammad Ali: "Imagine a W Indies team for World cup, Sammy (capt.), Dwayne Smith, Gayle, both Bravo, Pollard, Russel, Holder, Narine, Samuels, Badree, Gabriel, Roach and Simmons, Just imagine."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.preText: Final ten overs. West Indies need to play this like a T20 game now. Fizz returns.
items.text: good length on off, but angling across the batsman. Creams a cut shot off the back foot, but goes straight to Mehidy
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, no run

items.preText: MahneelMusa: "Remember last match being BD's match to lose as well so lets not get ahead of ourselves"
items.text: full outside off, and the angle away from Powell forces him to miss the shot. Tries to drive but misses completely
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, no run

items.text: slashed past the keeper! Full outside off again, and the drive takes a top edge through to the third-man boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on leg stump, but Powell comes down the wicket. Eventually tapped down the ground to long on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: length ball on leg stump, but Hope walks across to the off side and whips this off his pads, and over square leg for four. Exquisite
items.postText: Andy C: "Ban were 207-4 off 41 so WI not so very far behind. Come on Shai, prove them all wrong!"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs
